answers.answer: I have a 7 month old, and I am 3 months pregnant again....suprise. lolBut with my first, once I was in my third trimester if I went walking for more than 10 minutes I would get the sharpest cramps. It was normal I was told if that helps.I wish you the best though.

question: Earlier this week after going for a short walk I started getting an extremely sharp stabbing pain in my upper abdomen. It would at times radiate to my back. Since then I have gotten this pain off and on (about 3 days or so) lasting about about 20 seconds or so. I haven't experienced any spotting or bleeding. Blood pressure was good. I actually started experiencing nausea and vomiting this evening. Don't know if it is related of not to the pain. Note, I do have gestational diabetes. I have a doc appointment tomorrow so I will talk to her about it then. But what do you think? Anyone else experience this?
title: sharp pain
